content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1569437544884{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1451766709466{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73332″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/” css=”.vc_custom_1581352822228{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586893773272{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

C-mount Video Adapters

C-mount and endoscope camera adapters for surgical microscopes and ophthalmic slit lamps. Our patented design allows for interchangeable lenses to get the perfect image.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1451766722338{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73338″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/” css=”.vc_custom_1581354235600{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586893779138{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Digital Camera Adapters

Digital imaging solutions for slit lamps and surgical microscopes including SLR adapters and smartphone adapters. These products are ideal for anterior segment imaging.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1451766735451{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73342″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/endoscope-couplers/” css=”.vc_custom_1581354685891{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581613865570{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}”]

Endoscope Couplers

Couplers to connect C-mount cameras and digital cameras to any endoscope. Available in various fixed focal lengths, or with optical zoom.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=””][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1444993797023{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73345″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/” css=”.vc_custom_1581356042500{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581613893122{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}”]

CO₂ Laser Accessories

CO₂ laser accessories including micromanipulators for ENT and gynecology, laser handpieces in with options for fixed focal and zoom, and laparascope couplers.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1444993804144{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73349″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/” css=”.vc_custom_1581356438486{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581613908006{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Fiberoptic Handpieces

Handpieces to be used with contact laser fibers in a wide variety of procedures. Available in rigid or malleable with a range of shapes and sizes.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1444993811709{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73353″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/minimally-invasive-surgery/” css=”.vc_custom_1581356768553{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581613930574{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}”]

Minimally Invasive Surgery

The ACCU-Surg® line of stainless steel suction/irrigation cannula sets are high-quality, reusable and sterilizable instruments. The patented trumpet valve is guaranteed not to leak or stick.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1451766655032{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1444993797023{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73356″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/” css=”.vc_custom_1581356895203{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586894638312{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}”]

Medical Video Cameras

A range of C-mount video cameras suitable for any medical application. From cost effective 1080p cameras to 4k retinal cameras we have solutions for every budget.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1444993804144{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73930″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/” css=”.vc_custom_1592587869789{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1592586779341{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Personal Protective Equipment

Ensure the safety of your patients, employees, and yourself with medical grade Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1444993811709{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73363″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/oem-products/” css=”.vc_custom_1581357129030{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581613964960{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}”]

OEM Products

Custom engineered products with your specifications and branding. With competitive pricing and in-house laser engraving no project is too big or too small.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Our patented design allows for interchangeable lenses to get the perfect image. View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column […]
